description.value:
Trigger A creature you're observing succeeds at their saving throw against your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Area Fire] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Auto-Fire] attack.

You focus your weapons fire on a resilient target in order to suppress them with the sheer ferocity of your assault. The required target must succeed at a @Check[will|against:soldier] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Suppressed] until the start of your next turn.
